title.value: Using Artificial Intelligence to Label Free-Text Operative and Ultrasound Reports for Grading Pediatric Appendicitis
title.justification: The title is explicitly mentioned at the beginning of the paper.
title.quote: Using Artificial Intelligence to Label Free-Text Operative and Ultrasound Reports for Grading Pediatric Appendicitis

extractions.description: This paper evaluates the use of AI, specifically ChatGPT-4, compared to human data collectors in grading pediatric appendicitis by extracting data from free-text medical reports.

type.justification: The paper details an empirical study comparing the performance of AI (ChatGPT-4) and human data collectors in terms of accuracy and efficiency in data extraction from medical reports.
type.quote: This is a fully-paired comparative accuracy study [26] to compare the accuracy of ChatGPT-4 and human data collectors.

name.justification: The study focuses on grading pediatric appendicitis, which falls under the field of pediatric surgery.
name.quote: Harvey E. Beardmore Division of Pediatric Surgery, The Montreal Children's Hospital, McGill University Health Centre, Montreal, Quebec, Canada

name.justification: The study involves using AI technologies, specifically large language models like ChatGPT, for data extraction and classification tasks in healthcare.
name.quote: Artificial intelligence (AI) chatbots based on large language models can structure free-text EMR data.

name.justification: The use of ChatGPT-4 for structuring free-text data indicates a significant use of NLP techniques.
name.quote: Chatbots represent AI-driven applications that mimic human dialogue, offering automated responses to user queries through the use of NLP.

name.justification: The term machine learning is explicitly mentioned as a component of AI employed in the study.
name.quote: Artificial intelligence (AI) and its subset of machine learning (ML) show promise in pediatrics and surgery.

name.justification: ChatGPT-4 is the main AI model used in this study for data extraction from medical reports.
name.quote: We compare data extraction quality between ChatGPT-4 and human data collectors.

is_contributed.justification: ChatGPT-4 is a well-known AI model that was used in the study but not contributed by the authors.
is_contributed.quote: Despite not being originally intended for health-care applications, it exhibits potential in supporting patient queries and easing healthcare operations.

is_executed.justification: ChatGPT-4 was actively used in the study for structuring the free text from medical reports.
is_executed.quote: ChatGPT-4 was prompted to structure free text from 103 random anonymized ultrasound and operative records.

is_compared.justification: ChatGPT-4's performance was directly compared with that of human data collectors in terms of accuracy and efficiency.
is_compared.quote: We compared the data between human data extractors and ChatGPT-4 in 103 records.

referenced_paper_title.justification: While the specific referenced paper is not quoted, this is a well-known paper related to ChatGPT models.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Well-known examples of chatbots include Siri, Alexa and Google Assistant [19]. ChatGPT, recently featured, has proven to be a useful chatbot. This AI system utilizes ML algorithms and NLP to generate human-like responses.

name.justification: The dataset includes data from 2100 children operated for acute appendicitis over several years, specifically used to train and evaluate AI models in the study.
name.quote: To train AI models to grade pediatric appendicitis preoperatively, several data collectors extracted detailed preoperative and operative data from 2100 children operated for acute appendicitis.

referenced_paper_title.value: Outcomes of pediatric appendicitis: an international comparison of the United States and Canada
referenced_paper_title.justification: The specific dataset used in the study is not from a referenced paper but appears to be compiled by the research team for this study specifically related to pediatric appendicitis.
referenced_paper_title.quote: To develop an appendicitis severity prediction model, we extracted data from the ultrasound report and the operative report.

name.justification: REDCap was used as a data management tool for organizing and analyzing the collected data.
name.quote: A standard case report form was created in the secure web-based Research Electronic Data Capture (REDCap) software.

referenced_paper_title.value: Model-assisted cohort selection with bias analysis for generating large-scale cohorts from the EHR for oncology research
referenced_paper_title.justification: REDCap is an existing software tool that the study uses for data management, not contributed by the authors.
referenced_paper_title.quote: All de-identified information was exported into an Excel sheet. We calculated percentages and rates of discrepancy between human data extractors and ChatGPT-4.
